casebody.data:
Broderick FLOWERS, Appellant,
v.
STATE of Missouri, Respondent. WD 79572 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: May 29, 2018 Ellen Flottman, Columbia, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Richard Starnes, Jefferson City, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Before Division One: Lisa White Hardwick, P.J., Thomas H. Newton, and Anthony Rex Gabbert, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Mr. Broderick Flowers appeals the Jackson County Circuit Court judgment overruling a motion to vacate, set aside, or correct judgment and sentence. Mr. Flowers had been convicted by a jury of second-degree murder and armed criminal action and sentenced to twenty-five years' imprisonment. We affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
